judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed. See, Com. v. Zanine, 444 Pa. 361, 282 A. 2d 367 (1971).
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Joseph M. Casey and John W. Packel, Assistant Defenders, and Vincent J. Ziccardi, Defender, for appellant.
James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Raymond, Appellant.
Submitted May 4, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Joseph M. Casey and John W. Packel, Assistant Defenders, and Vincent J. Ziccardi, Defender, for appellant.
James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
October 12, 1971:
